title: Letters and memorials of Jane Welsh Carlyle.
author: Carlyle, Jane Welsh
snippet: is she that writes such a scratchy, illegible baud?) seuds her love to Mrs. Carlyle, and proposes to 'talk to her about Amisfield and Haddington.'

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Thus, Douglas ofDrumlanrig and Charteris of Amisfield did battletogether in presence of the King, each having accused the other of high treason.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: It is generally believed that the ancient Barons ofKinfauns are now represented in the male line by aonce-powerful branch of the name, the Charterisesof Amisfield, in Dumfries-shire.
